PROJECTS

NETFLIX CLONE

This is a Netflix clone project built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and MySQL. It includes sign-in and sign-up pages and utilizes MySQL to store user data.

PORTFOLIO

This is my personal portfolio website that i made using html,css,javascript,bootstrap,three js and firebase. This portfolio was very challenging to build as it contained the 3D elements.

BABY SENSE

This is a website that i made for a ECE project in my college which was a smart baby monitoring system using nodemcu. The parents could observe their baby's status using this website.In this i used html,css,bootstrap,javascript,react js and firebase.

ABOUT ME

Hello! I'm Shiraz Yousuf, a passionate web developer and programmer. I find immense joy in transforming ideas into functional and visually appealing digital experiences. Football is another great passion of mine, as it brings people together and allows for teamwork and camaraderie. Currently, I am an ECE student at IIIT Dharwad. With a constant thirst for knowledge, I actively engage in programming projects and stay up-to-date with industry trends.I am also good in JAVA programming. I am excited about the future, eager to connect with like-minded individuals, and contribute to innovative solutions that make a positive impact.
